scripts.init:ds:binary: cd ./divinestar/binary ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/binary/dist
scripts.init:ds:threads: cd ./divinestar/threads ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/threads/dist
scripts.init:ds:utils: cd ./divinestar/utils ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/utils/dist
scripts.init:ds:indexdb: cd ./divinestar/indexdb ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/indexdb/dist
scripts.init:ds:audio: cd ./divinestar/audio ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/audio/dist
scripts.init:ds:uri: cd ./divinestar/uri ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/uri/dist
scripts.init:ds:controls: cd ./divinestar/controls ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/controls/dist
scripts.init:ds:rng: cd ./divinestar/rng ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/rng/dist
scripts.init:ds:all: npm run init:ds:binary ; npm run init:ds:threads ; npm run init:ds:uri ; npm run init:ds:utils ; npm run init:ds:indexdb ; npm run init:ds:controls ; npm run init:ds:rng ; npm run ds:init:audio
